title: ICE with clippy and futures
body:
Not sure if this is a rustc bug or a clippy bug, but running `cargo clippy` on one library, the compiler panicked.

I tried the code in the `develop` branch of this repo: https://github.com/Razican/bittrex-rs

I expected to see the clippy linting results, but instead, the compiler panicked.

## Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:

```
rustc 1.27.0-nightly (e5f80f2a4 2018-05-09)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: e5f80f2a4f016bf724a1cfb580619d71c8fd39ec
commit-date: 2018-05-09
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.27.0-nightly
LLVM version: 6.0
```

Backtrace:

```
   Compiling nodrop v0.1.12
   Compiling libc v0.2.40
   Compiling cfg-if v0.1.3
   Compiling byteorder v1.2.2
   Compiling memoffset v0.2.1
   Compiling version_check v0.1.3
   Compiling lazy_static v1.0.0
   Compiling scopeguard v0.3.3
   Compiling slab v0.4.0
   Compiling futures v0.1.21
   Compiling lazycell v0.6.0
   Compiling pkg-config v0.3.11
   Compiling cc v1.0.15
   Compiling siphasher v0.2.2
   Compiling foreign-types-shared v0.1.1
   Compiling openssl v0.9.24
   Compiling scoped-tls v0.1.2
thread 'main' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 1 but the index is 1', /$HOME/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/clippy_lints-0.0.197/src/utils/higher.rs:76:32
   Compiling typenum v1.10.0
stack backtrace:
   0: std::sys::unix::backtrace::tracing::imp::unwind_backtrace
             at libstd/sys/unix/backtrace/tracing/gcc_s.rs:49

             at libstd/sys_common/backtrace.rs:59

             at libstd/panicking.rs:211

             at libstd/panicking.rs:227

             at libstd/panicking.rs:467

             at libstd/panicking.rs:350

             at libstd/panicking.rs:328

             at libcore/panicking.rs:71

             at libcore/panicking.rs:58

query stack during panic:
end of query stack

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.27.0-nightly (e5f80f2a4 2018-05-09) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C debuginfo=2 --crate-type lib

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden

error: Could not compile `futures`.
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: build failed
```
